content.question: Which of the following serves as evidence to support the claim that the New Negro movement represented a significant shift in African American culture?

choices.label: African American inventors and entrepreneurs embraced the New Negro movement as they developed products that fostered Black economic advancement.
The Harlem Renaissance was the result of large numbers of African Americans migrating to New York to escape the backlash to the New Negro movement.
Many of the key figures of the Harlem Renaissance were educated at HBCUs, which were created in response to the New Negro movement.
The Harlem Renaissance created a cultural, literary, and artistic revolution that reflected the political and cultural ideas reflected in the New Negro movement.

content.answer: The Harlem Renaissance created a cultural, literary, and artistic revolution that reflected the political and cultural ideas reflected in the New Negro movement.

topic.text: 3.11: The New Negro Movement and the Harlem Renaissance
